dsacoursework

Class ContactList

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsacoursework.ContactList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayable

    public class ContactList
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayable
    a circular linked list of contact nodes: contains contacts

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Node current
      keeps track of the starting node for the doubly linked list
      protected Node end
      keeps track of the starting node for the doubly linked list
      protected int size
      keeps track of the number of nodes in the doubly linked list
      protected Node start
      keeps track of the starting node for the doubly linked list

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactList()
      created an empty doubly linked contact list

                                    int pos)
        adds a new contact to the given position of the contact list
        Parameters:
        contact - - contact object that we want to add to the contact list
        pos - - the position in the contact list where we want to insert the contact

                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.text.ParseException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • removeContact

        public void removeContact(java.lang.String telephoneNo)
        removes a contact with the matching telephone no. from the contact list
        Parameters:
        telephoneNo - - the telephone number of the contact that is to be removed from the list

      • searchByTelephoneNo

        public Node searchByTelephoneNo(java.lang.String telephoneNo)
        searches the contact list to find the contact with the given telephone no.
        Parameters:
        telephoneNo - - the telephone number of the contact we are looking for
        Returns:
        contact (a contact matching the given telephone number)

      • searchByName

        public Contact searchByName(java.lang.String firstName,
                            java.lang.String lastName)
        searches the contact list to find the contact with the given name and surname.
        Parameters:
        firstName - - the first name of the contact we are looking for
        lastName - - the last name of the contact we are looking for
        Returns:
        contact (a contact with the given names)
